original_text: So Solomon made all the vessels that were in the house of God: the golden altar, the tables for the bread of the Presence,
korean_text: 솔로몬이 또 하나님의 전의 모든 기구를 만들었으니 곧 금 제단과 진설병 상들과

sentences.original_text: So Solomon made all the vessels
that were in the house of God
the tables for the bread of the Presence
